Package ax.ha.it.smsalarm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcknowledgeHandler
    Responsible for the application ax.ha.it.smsalarm acknowledge activity.
    AcknowledgeNotificationHelper
    Helper class to build up and show notifications, also creates pending intents for the notification.
    Alarm
    Class representing an Alarm.
    BuildConfig  
    DatabaseHandler
    Class responsible for all Database access and handling.
    LogHandler
    This class is responsible for all logging.
    NoiseHandler
    This class is responsible for all sound and vibration handling.
    NotificationHelper
    Helper class to build up and show notifications, also creates pending intent for the notification.
    PreferencesHandler
    This class is responsible for all Shared Preferences handling.
    PreferencesHandler is a singleton.
    R  
    R.array  
    R.attr  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.xml  
    SmsAlarm
    Main activity to configure application.
    SmsReceiver
    Class extending BroadcastReceiver, receives sms and handles them accordingly to application settings and sms senders phone number.
    Splash
    Splash activity, just shows splash screen and after a certain time or a tap on screen activity switch to SmsAlarm.
    UpdateHandler
    Responsible for any update actions.
    WakeLocker
    Class containing static methods to declare and acquire a WakeLock and for releasing it.
    WidgetProvider
    Provider class for the application widgets.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlarmTypes
    Enumeration for different types of alarms.
    LogHandler.LogPriorities
    Enumeration for different LogPriorities needed to decide which kind of logging we're suppose to do.
    PreferencesHandler.DataTypes
    Enumeration for different datatypes needed when retrieving shared preferences.
    PreferencesHandler.PrefKeys
    Enumeration for the shared preferences keys.
    SmsAlarm.DialogTypes
    Enumeration for different types of input dialogs.
